sqlMap.sql:
FROM t_dailywk m, t_dailywk_detail d, m_part p, m_wip w WHERE m.dailywkid = d.dailywkid AND d.partid = p.partid AND m.wip = w.wip m.dailywkid = #dailyWKId# m.reportdate >= #reportDateFr# m.reportdate <= #reportDateTo# p.partname LIKE #partName# + '%' p.partno LIKE #partNo# + '%' m.wip = #wip# m.reportType = #reportType#
m.shift IN #shifts[]#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT DISTINCT m.dailyWKId ,m.shift ,m.createDate ,m.lastUpdate ,m.reportDate ,m.reportType ,m.createBy ,m.updateBy ,m.wip ,w.wipName ,CASE m.reporttype WHEN 1 THEN 'Usual' WHEN 2 THEN 'Trial Product' WHEN 3 THEN 'Replacement' WHEN 4 THEN 'Other' END AS reportName ,CASE m.shift WHEN 'D' THEN 'Day' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Night' ELSE ' ' END AS shiftName
ORDER BY lastUpdate DESC

SELECT TOP 50 wo.workorderno, v.partid, v.customerid, (wo.workorderqty - ISNULL(wk.ttl,0)) as workOrderQty FROM v_cust_fg_part v
INNER JOIN m_part_wip pw on v.partid = pw.partid
INNER JOIN m_workorder wo on v.partid = wo.partid LEFT OUTER JOIN (select wkd.partid, wkd.workorderno, SUM(wkd.qty) as ttl from t_dailywk_detail wkd
wkd.customerid = #customerId# wkd.partid = #partId# wkd.workorderno like #workOrderNo# + '%'
group by wkd.partid, wkd.workorderno) wk on wo.partid = wk.partid and wo.workorderno = wk.workorderno
pw.wip = #wip# v.customerid = #customerId# v.partid = #partId# wo.workorderno like #workOrderNo# + '%'
sqlMap.update: UPDATE t_dailywk SET shift = #shift# ,lastupdate = getDate() ,reportdate = #reportDate# ,reporttype = #reportType# ,updateby = #updateBy# ,wip = #wip# WHERE dailywkid = #dailyWKId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),wk.reportDate,103) + ':' + wk.wip + ':' + CAST(d.customerId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(d.partId AS VARCHAR) as datailRef ,wk.reportDate ,d.customerId ,c.customerCode ,wk.wip ,d.partId ,p.partNo ,p.partName ,wk.shift ,ISNULL(SUM(d.ok),0) as ok ,ISNULL(SUM(d.ng),0) as ng ,ISNULL(SUM(d.pd),0) as pd ,ISNULL(SUM(d.qty),0) as qty ,ISNULL(SUM(d.timeused),0) as timeUsed ,ISNULL(SUM(d.manpower),0) as manPower ,ISNULL(SUM(d.losstime),0) as lossTime , d.losstime_reason_id as lossTimeReasonId ,r.reasonname as lossTimeReasonName ,d.staff ,CASE wk.shift WHEN 'D' THEN 'Day' WHEN 'N' THEN 'Night' ELSE '' END AS shiftName FROM t_dailywk_detail d INNER JOIN t_dailywk wk ON wk.dailywkid = d.dailywkid INNER JOIN m_customer c ON d.customerid = c.customerid INNER JOIN m_part p ON d.partid = p.partid LEFT JOIN m_reason r on r.reasonid = d.losstime_reason_id
wk.reportdate >= #reportDateFr# wk.reportdate <= #reportDateTo# p.partname LIKE #partName# + '%' p.partno LIKE #partNo# + '%' wk.wip = #wip# wk.reportType = #reportType#
wk.shift IN #shifts[]#
GROUP BY wk.reportdate, d.customerid, c.customercode, wk.wip, d.partid, p.partno, p.partname, wk.shift, d.losstime_reason_id, r.reasonname, d.staff ORDER BY wk.reportdate, c.customercode, wk.wip, p.partno, p.partname, wk.shift
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS rowData FROM t_dailywk_detail d INNER JOIN t_dailywk wk ON wk.dailywkid = d.dailywkid GROUP BY wk.reportdate, d.customerid, wk.wip, d.partid, wk.shift ) c

SELECT CONVERT(VARCHAR(10),wk.reportDate,103) + ':' + wk.wip + ':' + CAST(d.customerId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(d.partId AS VARCHAR) + ':' + CAST(ng.reasonId AS VARCHAR) as idRef ,ISNULL(SUM(ng.ng),0) as ng FROM t_dailywk_detail d INNER JOIN t_dailywk wk ON wk.dailywkid = d.dailywkid INNER JOIN m_part p ON d.partid = p.partid INNER JOIN t_dailywk_ngreason ng ON ng.dailywkdetailid = d.dailywkdetailid AND ng.dailywkid = wk.dailywkid
wk.reportdate >= #reportDateFr# wk.reportdate <= #reportDateTo# p.partname LIKE #partName# + '%' p.partno LIKE #partNo# + '%' wk.wip = #wip# wk.reportType = #reportType#
wk.shift IN #shifts[]#
GROUP BY wk.reportdate, wk.wip, d.customerid, d.partid, ng.reasonid

SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ CAST(nId AS VARCHAR) AS datailRef ,nPartId AS partId ,sPartNo AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,sCareerSheetNo AS workOrderNo ,dOperationDate AS reportDate ,sWip AS wip ,sProcess AS wipName ,sWorker AS staff ,nSortingQty AS qty ,nOKQty AS ok ,nNGQty AS ng ,nSortingTime_Min AS sortingTimeMin ,nSortingTime AS sortingTime ,nMachineId AS machineId ,sMachine AS machineNamey FROM V_11_DailyDeliveryInspection
sCareerSheetNo LIKE '%'+ #workOrderNo# +'%' nMachineId = #machineId# dOperationDate >= #reportDateFr# dOperationDate <= #reportDateTo# sWip = #wip# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%'
ORDER BY dOperationDate, sPartNo, sCareerSheetNo

SELECT ng.nid, CAST(ng.nId AS VARCHAR)+':'+ CAST(ng.nReasonid AS VARCHAR)+':'+ng.workorderno+':'+ CAST(ng.ngqty AS VARCHAR) AS idRef, min(ISNULL(ng.nNGQtyperReason,0)) AS ng FROM ( select sType, nId, nReasonId, workorderno , sum(nNGQtyperReason) as nNGQtyperReason, ngqty from V_11_DailyDeliveryInspection_NG group by sType, nId, nReasonId, workorderno, ngqty ) ng inner JOIN V_11_DailyDeliveryInspection v ON v.nId = ng.nId and v.sCareerSheetNo = ng.workorderno and ng.sType = v.sType and ng.ngqty = v.nNGQty
v.sCareerSheetNo LIKE '%'+ #workOrderNo# +'%' v.nMachineId = #machineId# v.dOperationDate >= #reportDateFr# v.dOperationDate <= #reportDateTo# v.sWip = #wip# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%'
group by ng.sType, ng.nId, nReasonId, workorderno, v.nSortingQty, ng.ngqty order by ng.nId, ng.ngqty, ng.nReasonid, ng.workorderno

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $maxRecord$ partid AS partId ,sPartNo AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,wip AS wip ,sProcess AS wipName ,dOperationdate AS reportDate ,machineid AS machineId ,sMachineName AS machineName ,sWorker AS staff ,nOKQty AS ok ,nNGQty AS ng ,nNGRatio AS ngRatio ,nOperationTime ,nSecondQty AS secondQty ,nShotQty AS shotQty ,sCareerSheetNo AS workOrderNo ,customerid AS customerId ,sCustomer AS customerName ,sReportType AS typeName ,nId AS id ,nStandardProductivity AS standardProductivity ,nStandardProductionPrice AS standardProductionPrice ,nActualOperatingProductivity AS actualOperatingProductivity ,nActualProductionPrice AS actualProductionPrice ,nDiff AS diff ,nPercentage AS percentage FROM V_13_ActualResultListPerProduct
wip = #wip# customerid = #customerId# machineid = #machineId# dOperationdate >= #reportDateFr# dOperationdate <= #reportDateTo# sCareerSheetNo LIKE #workOrderNo# +'%' sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%'
ORDER BY sPartNo, sPartName, wip, dOperationdate

SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ sPartNo AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,nTotalQty AS qty ,nNGQty AS ng ,nOKQty AS ok ,nOperationTime ,nActualOperatingProductivity AS actualProductivity ,nStandardProductivity AS standardProductivity ,nStandardProductionPrice AS standardProduction ,nActualProductionPrice AS actualProduction ,nDiff AS diff ,nPercentage AS percentage ,sProcess AS wipName ,dReportDate AS reportDate FROM V_14_WorkerProductivityCheckList
sWip = #wip# [dReportDate] >= #reportDateFr# [dReportDate] <= #reportDateTo# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%'
ORDER BY dReportDate, sPartNo

SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ sPartNo AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,sProcess AS wipName ,dReportDate AS reportDate ,sMachineName AS machineName ,sWorker AS staff ,nOKQty AS ok ,nNGQty AS ng ,nOperationTime ,sMaterial AS materialType ,nTotalQty AS totalQty ,nActualOperatingProductivity AS actualProductivity ,nStandardProductivity AS standardProductivity ,nStandardProductionPrice AS standardProduction ,nActualProductionPrice AS actualProduction ,nDiff AS diff ,nPercentage AS percentage FROM V_32_MachineProductivityCheckList
sWip = #wip# nMachineID = #machineId# nMaterialId = #materialId# dReportDate >= #reportDateFr# dReportDate <= #reportDateTo# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%'
ORDER BY dReportDate, sPartNo
SELECT classifybiz AS category FROM m_classify_business ORDER BY classifybiz

SELECT TOP $maxRecord$ sCustomerId AS customerId ,sCustomer AS customerCode ,sPartId AS partId ,sCustomerDeptCode AS partNo ,sPartName AS partName ,sCategory AS category ,nUnitWeight AS unitWeight ,nSaleUnitPrice AS saleUnitPrice ,nCurrency AS currency ,sMaterialName AS materialName FROM V_02_SalesUnitPriceList
sCustomerId = #customerId# sPartNo LIKE #partNo# +'%' sPartName LIKE #partName# +'%' sCategory = #category# nMaterialId = #materialId#
ORDER BY sCustomerDeptCode, sPartName
